pullRequest.title: [BEAM-2146] Disable unsupported categories for Dataflow streaming
pullRequest.bodyText:
This disables the tests failing at https://ci-beam.apache.org/job/beam_PostCommit_Java_ValidatesRunner_Dataflow_Streaming/5/#showFailuresLink
They are unsupported features on Dataflow.
Confirmed that prior runs have the same failures: they are not flakes and there are not additional flakes.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText: From what I can tell, this is unfortunately the idiomatic way to do named args in Groovy.
nodes.diffHunk:

   'org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.UsesCrossLanguageTransforms',
-  'org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.UsesDistributionMetrics',
-  'org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.UsesGaugeMetrics',
   'org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.UsesSetState',
